mdRecord.dcterms:title: Dr. C.H. Fitch's pocket prescription scale set
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: N.V. Randolph and Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in cardboard box; label information: Dr. C. H. Fitch's Pocket Prescription Scale, capacity 1/2 to 20 grains, folding spatula in each box, price, $1, Manufactured by N.V. Randolph & Co., Richmond, Virginia; Patented Sept 29th, 1885; instructions on inside of box; set includes: scale; bar.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Scales (Weighing instruments)
Technology, Pharmaceutical
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
